title: random fps drops
body: Since last patch i've had a lot of fps drops does anyone else have the same? I'm used at sitting on 80-100 fps but since last patch my fps just dives from 80 to 50 every other minute and i cant seem to understand why i've litterally no other app running and it's the same. i lower the setting to the lowest possible still same shit what is this....

replies.body:
There are a number of things that could cause your FPS to take a shit. Luckily, we've written up a nifty guide that covers the most common solutions for this, so definitely check out our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) first.

Let me know if those steps helped.
